name: Treasure Seekers 3: Follow the Ghosts
summary:
Spring into another exciting adventure with the new instalment of the Treasure Seekers series in Treasure Seekers. Follow the Ghosts as you help Nelly and Tom free some unlucky ghosts who are being trapped by an evil alchemist! 
 
Use your Hidden Object skills to explore a mysterious world, and discover valuable clues. Track down the necessary items to free the dead ancestor of Cardinal House, a shaman, and many other characters in your quest to stop the evil alchemist and save the day!
